userdevices_page_content.other: Devices will be automatically added here when you use them. You are limited to {{.Count}} devices.

searchresults_empty_content.other: Try another search or browse our content to find what you're looking for.

404_page_content.other:
Sorry, it looks like the page that you're looking for doesn't exist.

It could have been moved or deleted, or perhaps you misspelled something.

Try going back to the homepage to find what you were looking for.

validation_email_email.other: Please enter a valid email address.

validation_dob_required.other: Please enter your date of birth.

shopping_info_subtitle_wallet.other: Funds in your Wallet may be used for the purchase or rental of any content on ScreenPlu.

shopping_info_release_date_explanation_r.other: You can rent it now, but you won't be able to watch it until then.

shopping_info_release_date_explanation_b.other: You can buy it now, but you won't be able to watch it until then.

shopping_info_available_until_date_expla.other: You will not be able to view the content after this.
You will not be able to view the content after this.

shopping_info_watch_window_explanation_f.one: Once rented, your film will be available in your account for a day.
shopping_info_watch_window_explanation_f.other: Once rented, your film will be available in your account for {{.Count}} days.

shopping_info_watch_window_explanation2_.one: Once you press play, the watch window begins and you have an hour to watch the film as many times as you like.
shopping_info_watch_window_explanation2_.other: Once you press play, the watch window begins and you have {{.Count}} hours to watch the film as many times as you like.

shopping_info_watch_window_explanation_b.one: Once rented, the items in your bundle will be available in your account for a day.
shopping_info_watch_window_explanation_b.other: Once rented, the items in your bundle will be available in your account for {{.Count}} days.

shopping_info_watch_window_explanation2_.one: Once you press play on a specific film, the watch window begins and you have an hour to watch that film as many times as you like.
shopping_info_watch_window_explanation2_.other: Once you press play on a specific film, the watch window begins and you have {{.Count}} hours to watch that film as many times as you like.

shopping_info_watch_window_explanation_s.one: Once rented, your season will be available in your account for a day.
shopping_info_watch_window_explanation_s.other: Once rented, your season will be available in your account for {{.Count}} days.

shopping_info_watch_window_explanation2_.one: Once you press play on an episode, the watch window begins and you have an hour to watch that episode as many times as you like.
shopping_info_watch_window_explanation2_.other: Once you press play on an episode, the watch window begins and you have {{.Count}} hours to watch that episode as many times as you like.

shopping_price_plan_note.one: Charged every {{.Interval}} after your 24 hour free trial ends.
shopping_price_plan_note.other: Charged every {{.Interval}} after your {{.Count}} day free trial ends.

shopping_complete_rental_watch_window_en.other: When playback is started you will then have {{.Count}} hours to watch the item as many times as you like.
